info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 6:00PM EDT until May 14 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, including the following counties, Allegany and Garrett and eastern West Virginia, including the following county, Mineral.
* WHEN...Until midnight EDT tonight.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated more rain headed toward the warned area and flooding continues due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen and additional rainfall will exacerbate flooding tonight. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Keyser... Westernport... Piedmont... Elk Garden... Kitzmiller... Barton... Franklin... Luke... Warnocks... New Creek... Sulphur City... Emoryville... Reynolds... Mccoole... Antioch... Hartmansville... Ridgeville... Dogwood Flats... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING

area.areaDesc: Allegany, MD; Garrett, MD; Mineral, WV
